data.comment: Today's referee, Gianluca Manganiello, has blown to start the match.
Gianluca Manganiello awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 2, Ball goes out of play for a Cagliari goal kick.
In Verona, Hellas Verona push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In Verona a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 5, Corner awarded to Cagliari.
Cagliari have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Cagliari in Verona.
In the minute 6, Riccardo Sottil is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Cagliari's Riccardo Sottil is back in action after a slight knock.
Hellas Verona awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 8, Hellas Verona have been awarded a corner by Gianluca Manganiello.
Samuel Di Carmine (Hellas Verona) shoots – and rattles the crossbar!
Hellas Verona's Samuel Di Carmine is whistled for offside at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Hellas Verona close to the penalty box.
Cagliari needs to be cautious. Hellas Verona have an attacking throw-in.
Antonin Barak (Hellas Verona) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 12, It's a goal kick for the away team in Verona.
Cagliari to take a throw-in in Hellas Verona territory.
Can Cagliari capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Hellas Verona's half?
In the minute 14, Free kick for Hellas Verona in their own half.
Throw-in for Cagliari in the half of Hellas Verona.
Important block from the Hellas Verona defence as Leonardo Pavoletti fires in a strike for Cagliari.
In the minute 17, Cagliari have been awarded a corner by Gianluca Manganiello.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Gianluca Manganiello awards Hellas Verona a goal kick.
In the minute 19, Gianluca Manganiello signals a Hellas Verona throw-in in Cagliari's half.
Gianluca Manganiello signals a free kick to Cagliari in their own half.
Mattia Zaccagni puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 21, That's a fine assist from Davide Faraoni.
Gianluca Manganiello signals a free kick to Cagliari.
Federico Ceccherini (Hellas Verona) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 23, Free kick for Hellas Verona in their own half.
Free kick Cagliari.
Cagliari drive upfield and Leonardo Pavoletti gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Hellas Verona defender.
In the minute 26, Gianluca Manganiello signals a free kick to Hellas Verona in their own half.
Goal kick for Hellas Verona at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
In Verona, Darko Lazovic of Hellas Verona is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 30, Razvan Marin for Cagliari drives towards goal at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Hellas Verona are caught offside.
Free kick for Cagliari in the half of Hellas Verona.
In the minute 33, Hellas Verona awarded a free kick in their own half.
Cagliari are coming forward and Razvan Marin gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Hellas Verona have a goal kick.
In the minute 36, Gianluca Manganiello signals a free kick to Cagliari.
Ball goes out of play for a Hellas Verona goal kick.
Throw-in Hellas Verona.
In the minute 40, Corner awarded to Hellas Verona.
Cagliari will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Hellas Verona.
Hellas Verona surge into the attack at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi but Pawel Dawidowicz’s header is off-target.
In the minute 41, Goal kick for Cagliari at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
Adrien Tameze (Hellas Verona) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Hellas Verona have been awarded a corner by Gianluca Manganiello.
In the minute 43, Hellas Verona push forward at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi and Adrien Tameze gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Cagliari defence.
Hellas Verona awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Cagliari is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, Can Hellas Verona get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cagliari's half?
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second half has started at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Hellas Verona in their own half.
Throw-in for Hellas Verona in their own half.
Goal! Razvan Marin equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
In the minute 48, Leonardo Pavoletti instrumental with a fine assist.
Gianluca Manganiello signals a throw-in for Cagliari, close to Hellas Verona's area.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Verona.
In the minute 51, In Verona a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Hellas Verona in their own half.
Cagliari to take a throw-in in Hellas Verona territory.
In the minute 54, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ivan Juric (Hellas Verona) is making a first substitution, with Matteo Lovato replacing Darko Lazovic.
Hellas Verona make their second substitution with Eddie Salcedo replacing Adrien Tameze.
In the minute 56, Gianluca Manganiello signals a free kick to Hellas Verona in their own half.
Can Hellas Verona capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Cagliari's half?
Corner awarded to Hellas Verona.
In the minute 58, Throw-in for Cagliari at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
Free kick Cagliari.
Gianluca Manganiello signals a Cagliari throw-in in Hellas Verona's half.
In the minute 59, Ball safe as Cagliari is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Cagliari's Leonardo Pavoletti misses with an attempt on goal.
Hellas Verona have a goal kick.
In the minute 61, Cagliari have been awarded a corner by Gianluca Manganiello.
Hellas Verona awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Cagliari in Verona.
In the minute 62, Hellas Verona needs to be cautious. Cagliari have an attacking throw-in.
Gianluca Manganiello signals a throw-in for Hellas Verona, close to Cagliari's area.
Cagliari's Leonardo Pavoletti breaks free at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 64, Gianluca Manganiello awards Hellas Verona a goal kick.
Cagliari's Leonardo Pavoletti gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Hellas Verona defender.
Cagliari's Leonardo Pavoletti goes close with a header against the bar.
In the minute 67, Gianluca Manganiello signals a free kick to Hellas Verona in their own half.
Ebrima Colley is replacing Mattia Zaccagni for Hellas Verona at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
Andrea Favilli is replacing Samuel Di Carmine for the home team.
In the minute 69, Corner awarded to Hellas Verona.
Eddie Salcedo (Hellas Verona) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Ball goes out of play for a Cagliari goal kick.
In the minute 70, Cagliari have been awarded a corner by Gianluca Manganiello.
Cagliari's Paolo Farago attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Hellas Verona at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
In the minute 70, Free kick for Hellas Verona in the half of Cagliari.
Gianluca Manganiello awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Hellas Verona get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cagliari's half?
In the minute 72, Free kick in a good position for Hellas Verona!
Hellas Verona drives forward and Federico Dimarco gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Gianluca Manganiello signals a free kick to Cagliari.
In the minute 75, Riccardo Sottil (Cagliari) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Hellas Verona have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 76, Throw-in for Hellas Verona in the half of Cagliari.
The away team replace Leonardo Pavoletti with Alberto Cerri.
Can Hellas Verona get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cagliari's half?
Ebrima Colley's header is off-target for Hellas Verona.
In the minute 77, Cagliari have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Cagliari.
Free kick for Hellas Verona in their own half.
In the minute 80, Hellas Verona are pushing forward but Andrea Favilli's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Verona.
Cagliari awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 81, Gianluca Manganiello signals a free kick to Cagliari in their own half.
Eddie Salcedo (Hellas Verona) has received a first yellow card.
Throw-in for Cagliari close to the penalty box.
In the minute 82, Throw-in Hellas Verona.
Gianluca Manganiello awards the home team a throw-in.
Christian Oliva is on a sub for Razvan Marin for Cagliari.
In the minute 83, The away team have replaced Alessandro Tripaldelli with Babis Lykogiannis. This is the third substitution made today by Eusebio Di Francesco.
Joao Pedro for Cagliari gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Gianluca Manganiello awards Hellas Verona a goal kick.
In the minute 85, Throw-in high up the field for Cagliari in Verona.
Ball goes out of play for a Hellas Verona goal kick.
Andrea Favilli (Hellas Verona) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 86, Gianluca Manganiello awards Cagliari a goal kick.
Can Cagliari capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Hellas Verona's half?
Free kick for Hellas Verona in their own half.
In the minute 88, Cagliari needs to be cautious. Hellas Verona have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to Hellas Verona.
Federico Ceccherini of Hellas Verona gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 89, Goal kick for Cagliari at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Verona.
At Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Eddie Salcedo (Hellas Verona) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Cagliari have a goal kick.
Free kick for Hellas Verona in the half of Cagliari.
Hellas Verona have been awarded a corner by Gianluca Manganiello.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-1.
Matteo Tramoni is on a sub for Riccardo Sottil for Cagliari.
